title: Why Japan was more successful than China

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why Japan was more successful than China in resisting imperialist encroachments in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Japan’s manipulaiton of the rivalries among western governments
The introduction of democracy by the Meiji Restoration
The willingness of Japan’s elite to sponsor reform

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
